text: 1.8 [E] Consider the evaluation of the function f(z) = tan(z) in two neighborhoods: (a) nearz = 1; (b) forz < 3 butclose toit. 28 Chapter 1. Numerical Algorithms Which of those two problems is better conditioned? Provide a justification and give a numerical example similar to the one given in Example 1.5 to illustrate your answer. In what way is the function evaluation in part (b) of this exercise different than the examples in the exercises 1.5-1.7?
